column2: Fears for T N pension after talks
column3: Unions representing workers at Turner   Newall say they are 'disappointed' after talks with stricken parent firm Federal Mogul.

column2: The Race is On: Second Private Team Sets Launch Date for Human Spaceflight (SPACE.com)
column3: SPACE.com - TORONTO, Canada -- A second\team of rocketeers competing for the  #36;10 million Ansari X Prize, a contest for\privately funded suborbital space flight, has officially announced the first\launch date for its manned rocket.

column2: Ky. Company Wins Grant to Study Peptides (AP)
column3: AP - A company founded by a chemistry researcher at the University of Louisville won a grant to develop a method of producing better peptides, which are short chains of amino acids, the building blocks of proteins.
